Fertilizers, Pesticides & Crop Protection for Modern Agriculture

Insecticide, fungicide, herbicide and PGR solutions. Trusted by farmers across India.

Quality You Can Rely On

From cotton and paddy to vegetables and pulses – we back every product with field experience and support.

Backed by Research

Our R&D focuses on formulations that work in real field conditions and fit into your spray schedule.

Our Crop Protection Range

We offer insecticides, fungicides, herbicides and plant growth regulators (PGR) for field and horticultural crops.

Insecticide

Control aphids, whitefly, bollworms and sucking pests. Our insecticides are used on cotton, vegetables and pulses across India.

View products

Fungicide

Fight blight, mildew and leaf spots. Reliable disease control for paddy, horticulture and field crops.

View products

Herbicide

Weed control that works. Pre- and post-emergence options for rice, wheat, soybeans and more.

View products

PGR

Plant growth regulators and nutrition. Better root development, stress tolerance and harvest quality.

View products

What We Do

Pesticides and crop protection, from the ground up

Harishree Crop Science makes insecticides, fungicides, herbicides and PGR products for Indian farmers. We focus on formulations that work in real field conditions—whether you grow cotton, paddy, vegetables or pulses.

Our team supports you with clear usage and timing so you get the best from each spray. We also invest in research and quality control so every batch meets the same standard.

About us

Why Farmers Choose Us

Tested formulations

Our insecticides, fungicides and herbicides are developed and tested for efficacy and crop safety.

R&D and quality

In-house research and strict quality assurance so you get consistent results season after season.

Responsible use

We emphasise correct dose and timing so crop protection stays effective and sustainable.

Support when you need it

Technical guidance on plant protection, mixing and application so you spray with confidence.

Some of Our Well-Known Products

Widely used across India for pest control, disease control and weed management.

Bulldozer

Long-lasting pest control with fewer sprays. Farmers use it for tough infestations in cotton and vegetables.

Chemistry

Our blend for crop nutrition and protection. Supports healthy growth and yield in field and horticultural crops.

Green Out

Fast-acting weed control. Used for burndown and inter-row spraying; inactivated on soil contact.

Kavach

Fungicide that stops fungal diseases in their tracks. Fits into routine sprays for paddy, vegetables and fruits.
